description:
My place is close to Maison Kayser, Central Park, and all sorts of great restaurants/bars on 2nd ave.  You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the coziness, and your own private entrance and private studio.  . My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

-Super fast WiFi
-Access to drawers/ closet
-Sunlight during the day
-Comfortable bed

You have the entire place to yourself! It's a cozy spacious studio!

I live in the neighborhood so if you need me for any reason, I will be there!

THE BEST neighborhood in the Upper East Side with lots of restaurants and bars.  The newly open subway is just 2 minutes away.  It's only 10 minutes to Times Square!!
name: Spacious Entire Apartment in the Upper East Side
review: Great location, one block to the metro station. independent entrance. clean, comfy and warm (I was staying during the cold period).
